General.Name: DAIHAN Scientific Co. Ltd
General.Description: DAIHAN Scientific Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and supplies lab test tools and products in South Korea and internationally. It offers autoclaves, balances, baths, centrifuges, evaporators, gel documentation systems, heating stirrers, mills, shakers, viscometers, refrigerators/freezers, bath circulators, chillers/cooling circulators, freeze dry systems, glass/labware washers, heating mantles, hotplates, ovens, stirrers, water purification products, incubators, baths, desiccator cabinets, furnaces, heating blocks/dry bath incubators, homogenizers, magnifiers, reactors, and ultrasonic cleaners, as well as smart-lab and touch screen systems under the Wisd brand. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Wonju, South Korea.

5.Name: Sang Bum  Lee
5.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Openmarket ALLforLAB
